snippet.title: ARC Raiders: How to Outsmart Every Rat — Stop Dying to Ambushes!
snippet.description:
Rats have taken over topside in ARC Raiders, but with the right strategies you can outsmart every ambush and extract with your loot. In this guide we break down how to identify hostile players, spot shady behavior, avoid notorious rat hotspots.

00:00 Intro
00:35 Identifying Friend From Foe
01:39 Shady Behavior
02:50 Notorious Rat Spots
03:50 Rat Spots - Buried City
04:29 Rat Spots - Dam Battlegrounds
04:49 - Rat Spots Stella Montis
05:29 - Rat Spots Spaceport
05:50 Avoiding Rats All-Together
07:07 Tagging Grenades
08:01 Sound Travels...Far
08:45 Take Corners Slowly
09:48 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders
